title: Hour 2 - Will Baseball get out of its own way? (06-01-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Will Baseball get out of its own way? (06-01-20)
description:
Will Baseball get out of its own way? MLB is unaware of their market share, popularity doesnt compete with NBA/NFL/NHL Postponed seasons, Should NBA judge players by Shooting % instead of total points? The best players score effectively & efficiently, and why Antonio Brown will likely get left behind by the NFL, new wave of WR coming in by the dozen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
